title: I Am

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose somebody to become, gaining their abilities, attributes, and alignment. You may only become somebody once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If this is part of the Daily Streak Faction, you do not change alignments with your ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to the end of the game and ensure the person you became died.

desc:
Post 4761
*"I am not not, for I am."*
